data.title: Service Canada offices in Ontario
data.meta_description: Find your nearest Service Canada Centre to visit us for in-person assistance with Government of Canada programs and services
data.text:
Ontario

Health measures and other considerations to know before you visit

Masks are encouraged

Service Canada provides a mask-friendly environment. Clients and visitors should feel comfortable to wear a mask in our offices.

Don't visit if you:

are experiencing any symptoms associated with COVID-19 (even if mild);

have tested positive on a PCR or rapid test, been presumed positive for COVID-19 in the past 5 days; or

have been instructed by public health authorities or a health care provider to quarantine or isolate for any reason.

Limit the use of scented products

Service Canada promotes a scent reduced work environment and encourages the limited use of scented products in our offices.

Some services may not be available at all locations. Select an office from the list below for more information.

You may also view regional information and services unique to Ontario.

172 Offices
